channel.title: Need logo
channel.description:
Hello Well Im looking for a logo for my site runefantasy,
Here is a bit of info as to what im looking for
I want it to look attractive and what not,
[b]If possible have a mirror effect[/b]
I want it like classic and stuff so like knights, swords castles etc...
The Text should be pretty simple, I want it to say RuneFantasy - Please no glow and no animated effect
I will hope to see some renders of knights or things that have to do with a castle theme- not halo knight or call of duty soldier- a knight like a knight with shiny armor- maybe a castle in the background
The size should be not to big and not to small [so not a massive half a page logo like runegamers or not like moparisthebest's so lets say a reasonable 'logo' size
Thanks i look foward to see some people art works
Tyvvm!

item.title: Need logo
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

Please, just state a logo size, because it can vary where you want it placed. Also, if you could find the image links, it would be of great assistance.

Read full topic

item.title: Need logo
item.dc:creator: @natex natex
item.description:

Hello Well Im looking for a logo for my site runefantasy,

Here is a bit of info as to what im looking for

The size should be not to big and not to small [so not a massive half a page logo like runegamers or not like moparisthebest’s so lets say a reasonable ‘logo’ size
